definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to make a scapegoat of sb/to defame/to slander

sentences.english: Recently, I found out he has not disturbed his dog dish of food in days.
sentences.chinese: 最近我發現它幾天都不碰盛狗食的盆子。

sentences.english: This raspberry color looks too rich.
sentences.chinese: 這個覆盆子色看起來太豔了。

sentences.english: The fruit looks similar to raspberries, but are more orange in color.
sentences.chinese: 果實與覆盆子相近，但顏色更偏橘黃。

sentences.english: Melt the gelatine powder with hot water. Stir into raspberry.
sentences.chinese: 魚膠粉與熱水調至溶解，拌入覆盆子液中。

sentences.english: They baked their bread with frogs in it.
sentences.chinese: 他們烤麪包的盆子裏有青蛙。

sentences.english: As your plants flourish, you'll need to repot them in bigger pots.
sentences.chinese: 當植物茂盛了，你必須爲他們換盆到大一點的盆子。

sentences.english: Both characters will be cut in half hi, put the basin point of it on fire.
sentences.chinese: 兩人將喜字剪成兩半，放盆子裏點火燒了。

sentences.english: Water dropped from the ceiling into the pan on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 水從天花板滴落到地板上的盆子裏。

sentences.english: This basin is made of iron.
A few handfuls of raspberries or blackberries will transform the cheapest vodka.
sentences.chinese: 幾小勺覆盆子或黑莓可以媲美廉價的伏特加。

sentences.english: Nung-fu brought home a redwood seedling and planted it in a pot.
sentences.chinese: 農夫帶回一株紅木小樹苗，把它種在盆子裏。

sentences.english: Has a rich wild raspberry, black cherry, raspberry aroma.
sentences.chinese: 有着濃郁得野樹莓，黑櫻桃，覆盆子的香氣。

sentences.english: Strictly speaking, the banana is a kind of berry, raspberry, not berry.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格意義上說，香蕉是一種漿果，覆盆子並非漿果。

sentences.english: The water in the bowl can be used for pets.
sentences.chinese: 盆子裏的水可以用於寵物。

sentences.english: Aymo had a basin of spaghetti with onions and tinned meat chopped up in it .
sentences.chinese: 愛漠搞來了一盆子通心麪，拌着洋蔥和切碎的罐頭肉。

sentences.english: I've put out the nut dishes.
sentences.chinese: 我已經把那些細瓷盆子拿出來了。

definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)
